name: Fritzfon Solarimage
info:
#  Input
 - msg.info as string (if not provided clock will be shown)
 - msg.house as string or number
 - msg.fromGrid as string or number
 - msg.toGrid as string or number

# Rounding (Only works with numbers)
## Round modes:
Round = no unnecessary zeros.  
To fixed = add zeros to fit selected decemals.  

# Calculate house (Only works with numbers)
Will calculate msg.house + msg.fromGrid - msg.toGrid.  
msg.toGrid is optional.

meta.author: Tim Oberle
meta.desc: Show your current (solar) power information on your Fritzfon

parameters.name: font|str
parameters.hint: font to print. NOTE: This can be one of the presets or the path to a fnt file
